content: >**get 20 % off when you buy 3 patterns no coupon needed** this is an easy to make scarf that uses the half_double_crochet stitch and the half-double_crochet in the back loop only to create a beautiful ribbed scarf in no time the finished size is 86 inches long x 6 25 inches wide a video tutorial is available for this scarf https //youtu be/qzcfajvowmk
